sections.details: Build a real-time analytics dashboard for Project Atlas, including event ingestion pipelines, stream processing, and interactive data visualizations.
Fixed-fee milestones: Phase 1 $20,000 (net 30 on acceptance), Phase 2 $15,000, Phase 3 $10,000. Additional scope billed at $150/hour with prior approval.
This agreement is governed by the laws of the State of California. All work performed under this agreement is considered confidential and the intellectual property of Global Innovations Corp.
